attributes.action: More Refugees allowed into the UK who are able to earn a living wage.
attributes.additional_details:
Clearly this is not ok. Many refugees believe they are not paid enough to live on, we too believe this.

Refugees are human too...
 No human is illegal
attributes.background: Facts: Around 1.1 million refugees arrived in Germany just last year, making them the country who allows the most refugees in each year while the UK only has 117,000 which is only 0.18% of the population of the UK at the time.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
